content:
## 5f anniversarry iz ovar... (´･ω･`)

- did a sneeki change to da Genshin 5 yeer party icon, bak to regulur now ~ o( =∩ω∩= )m

## Laggy blurs, BEGONE! (ง •̀_•́)ง

- fuzzy bakground no maeks u laggy an see blury stuffs nao ~ (ノ◕ヮ◕)ノ*:･ﾟ✧

## Wat doin, Mewmew Candy? (◕ᴗ◕✿)

- gibbed all versins "Chaynjlog" badge! Com see owr grow diary! (ﾉ>ω<)ﾉ
- remaded da "Furigana Switch" room for Nihongo an Taiwan frens, so cozy nao! (｡•ᴗ•｡)♡
- langwedge choozy screen got new fashun too! ♪(^∇^*)

## Wher iz Mewmew Candy 2dae? (･ω<)☆

- game ID an social media acounts can sho nao! Wher Mewmew Candy be? ٩(◕‿◕｡)۶
- Chinese versins big happy fambly! Malaysia an Singapore versins togever nao! (★ω★)/
- langwedge choozy screen so shiny new! (≧∇≦)ﾉ

## Wan hear ur voice (⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)

- Taiwan Chinese versin can has furigana magics too! Go see! (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧
- all versins has "hooman feedback" mailbox nao, we lissens! (.❛ ᴗ ❛.)
- new smort langwedge chooser page! Mewmew gesses... dis ur mother lang? (・∀・)?

## Doin da Furigana Magics (ノ°ο°)ノ

- Nihongo versin can has furigana nao! Go use! ~(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧
- put smol credit for bakground pikchur artiss in all cornurs, thank u teachur! m(_ _)m

## Liquid Glass! So fancy! (☆▽☆)

- whole face wearin new liquid glass dress ~ ✨ヽ(●´∀`●)ﾉ✨

## Huayu or Huawen? (・∀・)

- changed all "Huayu" to more bettur "Chinese" ~ (￣ω￣)/

## New Skill Get!! ٩(◕‿◕)۶

- added langwedge picky menu ~ talk to Mewmew Candy in ur birth lang! ヽ(✿ﾟ▽ﾟ)ノ

## Across many werlds, we finally meets (●ˊωˋ●)ゞ

- can speaks many langs nao! English, Chinese (Malaysia), Chinese (Singapore), Traditional Chinese (Taiwan) all OK! ~ ♪(´▽｀)

## 'Member Mewmew Candy's birfday? (✿◠‿◠)

- has birfday remindurs nao! Com wish happi birfday on social media! ヽ(●´∀`●)ﾉ🎂

## Insyd big glow up (￣︶￣)↗

- used blocky cod bricks to rebild evryfing

## Day we meted u (｡♡‿♡｡)

- How wuz ur furst time seein dis werld? Mewmew Candy tryin hard to maeks nice furst home for u ~ (๑•́ ₃ •̀๑)✧
- pages load fast like ZOOM! ⚡(ﾉ>ω<)ﾉ
- How u fit in dis new werld? Anywher u from, smol werld always open for u! (fits all hooman rectangles nao) (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ
- privacy rules page more clearer nao! (•̀ᴗ•́)و

## Grownd extra stronk nao (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧

- invited Google Analytics 4 butler to help build dream werld! (￣ω￣)/
- changed to dreamy "Glass Morphism" new skin! ✨ヽ(●´∀`●)ﾉ✨

## Furst Meet (◕‿◕✿)

- furst versin out nao, can speak Nihongo! ヽ(>∀<☆)ノ
